definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Friends like capital, the more friends are the better the entrepreneur is.
sentences.chinese: 朋友尤如資本金，對創業者來說是多多益善。

sentences.english: It is about 30 minutes drive south from the state capital, Ipoh .
sentences.chinese: 這是約30分鐘車程，南，從國家資本金，怡保。

sentences.english: A form of mortgage where no prepayments are allowed on the principal amount of the mortgage during a given period of time.
sentences.chinese: 在一個特定時期內，不允許提前付清本金的貸款形式。

sentences.english: There is no guarantee of the repayment of principal.
sentences.chinese: 本公司不能保證付還投資本金。

sentences.english: When it was founded, members were required to subscribe to its capitalization.
sentences.chinese: 在創辦時，它要求成員國認購股份，提供資本金。

sentences.english: We want our banks to be well-capitalized.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望我們的銀行資本金充足。

sentences.english: The savings office will issue a deposit certificate（passbook） to you and you will be paid the principal in a lump sum when the deposit is due.
sentences.chinese: 由儲蓄機構發給存款憑證，到期一次支取本金。

sentences.english: If we bring it into the funds, we shall maybe lose the principal and all.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們把它變做公債，我們也許會喪失本金和一切。

sentences.english: Payment for imports and repayment of principal and interest on international loans.
sentences.chinese: 支付進口和償還國際貸款的本金和利息。

sentences.english: It may earn simple interest, whichmeans the interest is figured on your principal alone
sentences.chinese: 只生單利，那意味利息與本金是分開計算的。

sentences.english: In particular, they need to be required to have adequate capital.
sentences.chinese: 特別是，要求他們必須具備充足的資本金的規定。

sentences.english: Stanford University shall remit the principal within 6 months since the date of the issuance of this Reply.
sentences.chinese: 斯坦福大學應在本批覆之日起6個月內匯入本金。

sentences.english: Any remaining money from the payment is used to reduce principal.
sentences.chinese: 還款之後所剩的任何錢都可以用來減少本金。

sentences.english: But two will continue to pay its guarantee issue debentures the interest and the capital.
sentences.chinese: 但兩房將繼續支付其擔保發行債券的利息和本金。

sentences.english: We need a payment module for VirtueMart connecting to Capital payment.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要爲零售商資訊連接到資本金的支付模塊。

sentences.english: Non-deliverable contracts are settled in dollars.
sentences.chinese: 無本金交割合同中的結算貨幣是美元。

definition: a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
certificate of deposit/time deposit/abbr. for 定期存款|定期存款[ding4 qi1 cun2 kuan3]
